entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few showers and periods of drizzle ending this evening then cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of snow. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to light snow after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
